description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows Mark of the Web security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-38213):

1. Identify the appropriate KB article for your system version:
   -**Windows 11 Version 23H2**: [KB5039212](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039212)
   -**Windows 11 Version 22H2**: [KB5039212](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039212)
   -**Windows 11 Version 21H2**: [KB5039213](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039213)
   -**Windows 10 for x64-based Systems**: [KB5039225](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039225)
   -**Windows 10 for 32-bit Systems**: [KB5039225](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039225)
   -**Windows 10 Version 22H2**: [KB5039211](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039211)
   -**Windows 10 Version 21H2**: [KB5039211](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039211)

2. Download and apply the update package from the relevant link based on your system version.
3. Restart your system after the installation to ensure the updates take effect.

**Details**:
These KB updates address the protection mechanism failure associated with this vulnerability, which could potentially be exploited to bypass security features. Ensure to back up any critical data before proceeding with the updates.
